Links used to track which source members come from. Can be swapped out to test performance of different sources over time.

## Discord Setup

- **Pinned message:** Directs Jake's members to join DD for community discussion — not a sales message
- **Free access offer:** "Message me for free premium access" — keeps it personal
- **Partner Promo Bot:** Jake has manual access now; full member access live November 3rd
- **Porsche's Picks channel:** Jake can begin posting picks whenever ready; bet tracking spreadsheet provided with AI-assisted setup

## Channels

- Sports discussion channels (NBA, NHL, MLB, soccer, esports, UFC, NFL) to be opened as public channels for community engagement
- Server channels to be cleaned up before launch: EV channels, onboarding, server guide updated
- Attribution mod channel to be set up for Jake to submit screenshot proof

## Staff Setup for Jake's Incoming Staff

- Each incoming staff member to be set up with correct Discord roles and flags
- Analysts: full procedure walkthrough (picks process, bet tracking, attribution)
- Mods: explanation of role and goal of helping Jake's members acclimate to DD
